SRecProtocol.Server

Class ServerConnectionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • SRecProtocol.Server.ServerConnectionService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerConnectionService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Author:
    Jose Miguel Zamora Batista. ServerConnectionService never run in the same thread that SRecServer does.
    See Also:
    It has a list off connections and Executor service creating new threads for deal with new clients using ServerConnectionHandler objects., ServerConnectionHandler
